data.title: Maksim Chmerkovskiy News, Pictures, and Videos
data.meta_description: Get the latest and most updated news, videos, and photo galleries about Maksim Chmerkovskiy
data.text:
Jojo Siwa Reveals The Names She Chose For Her Future Kids

JoJo Siwa shares she’s already thought about what she’ll call her future kids and has made the choice permanent: “I actually have two tattoos dedicated to them.”

Dancing With the Stars' Val Chmerkovskiy and Jenna Johnson Detail Son's Bond With Maks' Kids

Married Dancing With the Stars pros Val Chmerkovskiy and Jenna Johnson exclusively told E! News about the relationship between their son Rome and Maks Chmerkovskiy and Peta Murgatroyd's kids.

DWTS' Peta Murgatroyd and Maks Chmerkovskiy Expecting Baby 7 Months After Welcoming Son Rio

Seven months after Dancing With the Stars' Peta Murgatroyd and Maks Chmerkovskiy welcomed their son Rio, the pros shared another baby is on the way.

Jojo Siwa to Replace Nigel Lythgoe As Judge on ‘So You Think You Can Dance’

JoJo Siwa is replacing Nigel Lythgoe on ‘So You Think You Can Dance’ season 18. The ‘Dance Mom’ alum will join judges Allison Holker and Makism Chmerkovskiy.

Phaedra Parks Reveals She Almost Wasn't In 'The Traitors' At All!

Phaedra Parks sits down with E! News to talk about her show 'The Traitors' and why she almost didn't join the cast. For even more, tune in to E! News Mon - Thurs at 11 PM on E!

DWTS’ Peta Murgatroyd and Maks Chmerkovskiy Share Baby Boy’s Name and First Photo

Dancing with the Stars’ Peta Murgatroyd and Maks Chmerkovskiy shared a photo of their baby boy along with his name in a sweet Instagram post. The newest addition joins older brother Shai.

DWTS’ Peta Murgatroyd and Maksim Chmerkovskiy Welcome Baby Boy on Father's Day

Dancing With the Stars’ Peta Murgatroyd and Maksim Chmerkovskiy welcomed a baby boy on June 18, Father's Day, joining the couple's 6-year-old son Shai in the family.

How Maksim and Val Chmerkovskiy’s Fatherhood Dreams Came True

Maks, whose second child is on the way, and new dad Val Chmerkovskiy are first to declare how lucky they are—and why they never take the health and happiness of their families for granted.

Maksim and Val Chmerkovskiy Share How Family Struggles Turned Into "Incredible Opportunities" for Joy

Maks Chmerkovskiy, whose second son is on the way, and first-time dad Val Chmerkovskiy, served E! News some delicious family updates while promoting their new Subway partnership.

Pregnant Peta Murgatroyd and Maksim Chmerkovskiy Reveal Sex of Baby With Help From Son Shai

Before Dancing With the Stars' Peta Murgatroyd and Maksim Chmerkovskiy welcome their bundle of joy, they're revealing the sex of their baby. Learn more about their little one on the way.

Pregnant Peta Murgatroyd and Maks Chmerkovskiy Surprise Son With Puppy Ahead of Baby's Arrival

Pregnant Peta Murgatroyd and Maks Chmerkovskiy revealed footage of how they surprised their son Shai, 6, with a puppy as the couple awaits the birth of their second child.

Pregnant Peta Murgatroyd and Maks Chmerkovskiy Share Glimpse Inside Tropical Baby Moon

Pregnant Peta Murgatroyd and Maks Chmerkovskiy took followers along as they jetted off to Cabo San Lucas with their 6-year-old son Shai for a baby moon two months before Peta's due date.

See Peta Murgatroyd and Maksim Chmerkovskiy Meet Jenna Johnson and Val's Baby for the First Time

As she prepared to welcome her second child with Maksim Chmerkovskiy, Dancing With the Stars' Peta Murgatroyd recalls the couple's first meeting with their baby nephew.

Pregnant Peta Murgatroyd Details the Anxieties That Come With Expecting After Multiple Miscarriages

Peta Murgatroyd could not be more thrilled to be expecting again with husband Maks Chmerkovskiy, but after three miscarriages, she's feeling cautious. The dancer details her journey with E! News.

Why Maksim Chmerkovskiy and Peta Murgatroyd Are on "Pins and Needles" After Sharing Their Pregnancy News

Ahead of Ukraine's Day of Unity on Jan. 22, Maksim Chmerkovskiy spoke to E! News about feeling cautiously overjoyed to be expecting another baby with wife Peta Murgatroyd.

DWTS' Maksim Chmerkovskiy Recalls "Rollercoaster" Relationship With Kirstie Alley After Her Death

After news of Kirstie Alley's death broke, Maksim Chmerkovskiy paid tribute to the late actress and his former Dancing With the Stars partner. Read his message here.

Len Goodman Is Leaving Dancing With the Stars After 17 Years

On the Nov. 14 episode of Dancing With the Stars, head judge Len Goodman revealed he will be leaving the show at the end of the season. Find out how he made his emotional announcement.
